metadata.title: CVE-2013-4342 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: xinetd does not enforce the user and group configuration directives forTCPMUX services, which causes these services to be run as root and makes iteasier for remote attackers to gain privileges by leveraging anothervulnerability in a service.

criterions.comment: xinetd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
